m_szDocTitle: UK Electric Car Registrations Up 350% | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: UK Electric Car Registrations Up 350% Originally published on EV Obsession . Last year, I was stumped how UK electric car sales could be so lame when the country offers such good incentives. Perhaps the issue was that no one knew about them, as sales have jumped through the roof this year. With over 14,000 electric cars sold in the UK in the first half of the year, the increase over the same period in 2014 is a whopping 350%. In fact, with 300 more sales, the running total for 2015 will match (and then quickly surpass) the 2014 total of 14,500. Brits registeredÂ a little more than 35,000 electr
